cellular.title: 5G Small Cells Expanding Across Latin America
cellular.summary: New deployments by regional carriers show rapid growth of 5G small cells in commercial and industrial zones.

cellular.title: Private 5G Networks for SMEs Now Affordable
cellular.summary: Pricing reductions in CBRS and shared-spectrum licensing are making private 5G networks increasingly accessible.

telephony.title: VoIP Adoption Surges for Remote Teams
telephony.summary: SMEs continue replacing legacy PBX systems with cloud-hosted VoIP solutions for cost savings and reliability.

telephony.title: AI-Based Call Routing Improves Support Quality
telephony.summary: Advanced AI routing is helping call centers reduce queue times and improve customer satisfaction.

web.title: PWAs Gain Momentum in Enterprise Environments
web.summary: Progressive Web Apps are being adopted for internal dashboards and customer portals due to low maintenance costs.

web.title: High-Performance Edge Hosting for SMEs
web.summary: Affordable edge hosting options are now available, improving load times across continents.
